attributes.action: To Stop Asylum Seekers & Foreign People taking UK Benefits out of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Stop Asylum Seekers & Foreign People from taking UK Benefits that they are given to their own country. To lower Child Tax Benefits on Non Paying Citizens. Lower the amount of time Asylum Seekers are allowed in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
